description: Lucio Maverick is one hot gay pornstar, and doesn't everyone know it! We see him alongside Michael Lucas and several other models from Lucas Entertainment behind the scenes -- just when all of the hot guys thought the filming was done. It's not all about uncut dicks, hard bodies, sucking cock, and fucking tight ass: there is lot that goes into a gay porn shoot.
title: Lucio Maverick Goes Behind the Scenes of 'Cruising Budapest 3'
